attributes.action: To continue to provide NHS funding to support Combat Stress.
attributes.additional_details: My biggest concern is now that funding has stopped to Combat Stress, it will now have to reduced their staff numbers which will lead to lack of vital skills that they have devolved over time to dissolve.  This will also reduce the number of veterans they can treat and provide support to.  Combat Stress understand how to interact with veterans and to provide the best treatment available to which suits the patients needs.
attributes.background: Combat Stress have provided treatment to Veterans since 1919 and have vast experience in treating PTSD and mental health issues.
